MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 7.44PM in the WA16 postcode area of Knutsford following reports of a faulty transformer. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers have arrived on site and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.03PM on 18th January 2021.
